backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature IDs to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of core frontend files including App, AlphabetGrid, styles, and A-words data.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variables for color themes and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that switches between the alphabet grid and A-words page with header and footer UI.
frontend/src/components/AlphabetGrid.tsx: Generates an interactive grid of A–Z cards, making A clickable to trigger navigation.
frontend/src/data/aWords.ts: Exports a static list of English words beginning with A for display in the A-words page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with custom warm amber theme and font settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wrapping the app with query and identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AWordsPage.tsx: Page that displays a grid of A-words with a back button and summary section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a themed, responsive UI.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s project state, listing existing features for alphabet pages and pending requests for alphabet and A-word listings.
